##Seven details about Vulcan Mountain Hospital

Wechat, renwumag1980

Feature Introduction, the best Chinese character report

At 9:26 am on February 4,2020, the high-profile Huoshenshan Hospital in Wuhan admitted its first group of 50 patients. According to media reports, they were from the Hankou Hospital, Wuchang Hospital and other hospitals, the transfer task by the Wuhan Emergency Center. The 50 patients will spend the next few days in the seven departments of infection at Huoshenshan Hospital, from the city of Wuhan to the remote Lake of Zhiyin in Caidian District.

The construction of the Vulcan Mountain Hospital started on January 25, and the first ward was opened on February 4,11 days in total. After looking forward to a good ward one after another, admitted to treatment, ease the difficulty of Wuhan patients.
Here are seven details that people reporters at Vulcan Mountain Hospital noticed.

At 9:26 am on February 4,2020, the high-profile Huoshenshan Hospital in Wuhan admitted its first group of 50 patients. According to media reports, they were from the Hankou Hospital, Wuchang Hospital and other hospitals, the transfer task by the Wuhan Emergency Center. The 50 patients will spend the next few days in the seven departments of infection at Huoshenshan Hospital, from the city of Wuhan to the remote Lake of Zhiyin in Caidian District.

The construction of the Vulcan Mountain Hospital started on January 25, and the first ward was opened on February 4,11 days in total. After looking forward to a good ward one after another, admitted to treatment, ease the difficulty of Wuhan patients.

Here are seven details that people reporters at Vulcan Mountain Hospital noticed.

By Kevin | May

Editor | Goldstone

1

The first batch of 50 patients transferred to Huoshenshan, are basically mild cases, transferred from hospitals such as Hankou Hospital. The doctor explained the reason for this choice ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————. So we'll start with the mild cases, and then we'll start with the mild cases.

In a CCTV live broadcast last night, Dr. Ding, who is in charge of the transfer, introduced the process of transferring patients.

Each ambulance will pick up five patients, and the doctor will get a list of five. The patients also had a Qr Code, which recorded their basic information, their medical records, and their numbers. Then to the Vulcan Mountain Hospital, will also be treated and admitted according to this number. In this way, the Qr code traces the patient's entire medical history.

An ambulance for the transfer of patients is also a unique ambulance. Negative pressure between the cockpit and the rear compartment. Once the patient is in the car, the driver can press the button to turn on the negative pressure mode, and the air on both sides will not exchange. During the whole transportation process, the glass between the two compartments is forbidden to be opened.

People's Daily of Tuyuan for transfer of patients

2

Fifty patients will receive treatment in seven departments of infection. Part of the patients on the first floor of the seven departments of infection Ward 1, the remaining patients on the second floor of the seven departments of infection ward 2. The inpatient building has a ramp, a few meters high, that leads directly from the ground to the upper floor, and patients can be pushed directly to the second floor from the ambulance.

According to the ward sign, there are 48 beds in Ward 1,56 beds in Ward 2, and 104 beds in total. A Ward in Ward 1 has been converted into a laboratory, so it is estimated that there are about 100 patients that can be accommodated in the seven departments.

The wards of Vulcan Mountain Hospital are designed as a Standard Infectious Disease Hospital. The front and back doors of the ward have corridors, and the corridor outside the front door is a special passageway for medical staff. The hallway outside the back door, patient access, is a contaminated area. It's designed to prevent cross-contamination.

Opening the first door of the ward, the first thing you see is a buffer zone with several square meters of space. One more little door, and that's the real room. The room has air conditioning, TV, UV light, toilet and shower. There's a boom box at the head of the bed, and there's an aspirator, which is used to suction sputum and nebulize the patient. On 3 February, all kinds of medical instruments were placed in the ward.

Like the Xiaotangshan Hospital, each ward of Vulcan Mountain also has a transfer window with switches inside and outside. It is used by doctors and nurses to deliver medicines and food to patients.

Transfer window graph source network

3

Also live on CCTV, the doctor in charge of Transport Ding introduced the completion of the Vulcan Mountain Hospital. "The main structure of Vulcan Mountain is almost complete. Electricity and water have been connected, and now is a ward to a ward to the construction area. One Ward has been completed and can be occupied, the main body of other wards has been completed, but the internal engineering and equipment, etc. , are still improving. "

It's pretty much the same thing that people saw on the scene. At present, the completed ward is located in the Vulcan Mountain Hospital in the innermost of the seven departments of infection, which is a white two-story building.

After the completion of the seven branches of infection, another near completion is an adjacent building of the same size. Construction workers should be one of the most knowledgeable about the progress of the construction, the workers in charge of installing the fans and the workers in charge of electrical and mechanical work said the building would take about three days to complete.

Also waiting to be finalized are the ICU ward in the middle of the hospital and the adjacent medical technology building.

The whole picture source network of Huoshenshan Hospital

4

February 3 afternoon, Vulcan Mountain infection seven departments of negative pressure ward completed the final acceptance.

The negative pressure ward is usually the special ward of an Infectious Disease Hospital. The air pressure inside the ward is lower than the air pressure outside the ward, so that the fresh air outside can flow into the ward, while the air inside the ward that has been polluted by the patient, is through the special channel timely discharge to the fixed place, thus reducing the risk of infection of medical staff.

Vulcan Mountain Hospital negative pressure ward is set up, there is an air inlet on the ceiling, near the ground there is a large pipe, is the air outlet. Staff Introduction, the air is taken out from the outside, outside the ward with a fan, the air into the ward, and then from the air outlet to the outside to complete a cycle.

Before it is released into the atmosphere, the air from the ward is filtered through a three-stage filter, which is primary, medium and high efficiency. At the High Efficiency Stage, the grid is so dense that most particles, such as aerosols, can not pass through and are filtered out.

The key point of the negative pressure ward is that the velocity of air exhaust in the ward is higher than the velocity of air supply, and the air supply in the Middle Corridor of the ward is basically just air supply. "people" at the scene to see that the medical staff corridor there are several huge air inlets, than in the ward much larger air inlets. In this way, the air pressure in the staff hallway is higher than the air pressure in the ward, and the air is not exchanged for the purpose of protecting the staff.

At the scene we see, Hubei Province CDC staff pulled out a hair of their own, respectively in the air outlet and air inlet, test the size and direction of the wind. According to their introduction, the current opening of the seven departments of infection is the general ward, the pressure difference is about 5 PA. The ICU, which has not yet been opened, will require a higher negative pressure of up to 10 PSI because of the more severe patients.

The negative pressure ward, to the room airtight request is very high. Before acceptance, a large number of staff are in the ward to do sealing work. Use Foam Glue for big gap and SEALANT for small gap. We're GONNA have to go back and forth, make sure it's all sealed.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
Negative pressure ward

5

On the morning of February 3, in a ward on the first floor of the seven departments of laboratory medicine, the staff of the laboratory medicine department are doing the final equipment debugging.

Huoshenshan Hospital, director of the Department of Clinical Laboratory Xia Xinyi, is the General Hospital of the Eastern War Zone, deputy director of the Department of Clinical Laboratory, this time to set up a team. He told people that they were only able to complete some routine tests and were waiting for the medical building to be completed so that the lab could do nucleic acid tests. All the nucleic acid tests at Vulcan Mountain hospital... don't need to be sent out. The hospital can handle it.

The hospital has designed a laboratory based on the size of 1,000 beds, and Xia estimates that they can test up to 300 samples a day. The discharge standard at Vulcan Mountain Hospital, like other hospitals, must be negative for two consecutive nucleic acid tests at intervals of more than one day.

CT equipment is also in place in the refurbished medical technology building.

Picture source Beijing News inside the ward

6

When the location of the Huoshenshan hospital was first announced, it was questioned whether the proximity to the water source (Zhiyin Lake in Wuhan) would cause pollution. February 3, responsible for sewage treatment of a company staff also to "people" about the current situation of sewage treatment.

This time, the sewage treatment equipment used in Vulcan Mountain can be called a group of carbon steel structure "integrated container" , which includes five major functions, such as regulating tank, emergency, disinfection, high-efficiency biological reaction, high-efficiency precipitation and so on. This is already designed before, in the delivery to the Vulcan Mountain site, just need to quickly assemble and install.

The container, which can handle 800 heads of sewage per day, is also equipped with a "double-safe" system, meaning a spare set of devices that can be used in the event of a system failure, to ensure that all hospital sewage is treated in a timely manner.

This set of equipment has been used in many hospitals in Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Shanghai, this technology and process, are also in accordance with China's requirements for the construction of infectious disease hospitals. Vulcan Mountain has now been delivered, and they are now back at Thor Mountain, where construction continues.

Fushen mountain sewage treatment equipment image source global network

7

In the two or three days before the seven departments of infection admitted patients, the workers were all working through the night. February 3 morning, "people" reporters in a ward met a few plumbers, they stayed up all night, the day is still doing the final finishing work. I had no choice but to smoke. Many of the workers are women, recruited from Jiangxia District by construction companies to mow lawns and clean, but also to do manual labor such as hauling and welding.

On the eve of his admission, at 11 o'clock, more than a dozen workers from the Third Bureau of the Central Construction Bureau were still dealing with a water leak in a ditch. They were wearing thin pink face masks, and their hands had turned white from being in the water for so long.

A worker came to my wechat and said two words: "Nice to meet you. ". His head is a red picture, with a line of small print on it, "Wuhan is a city that faces up to difficulties and surmounts them. ". His latest friend circle has four words: Late night drive, complete with two pictures, one of which shows him traveling from his hometown in Guangshui, Hubei Province, to Wuhan, where the community gave him a pass. It reads: "Xx, a resident of our community, is driving to Wuhan to support the construction of the Huoshenshan Hospital. The situation is true. Please let him go. ". "

Workers take a break on the spot
